title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from Don't_know to 201_to_300, and lastly slightly increasing from 201_to_300 to 0_to_100.
Max Share of respondents about 44.0 was recorded at Year Don't_know
Min Share of respondents about 5.0 was recorded at Year 201_to_300
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 201_to_300 to 0_to_100.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from Don't_know to 201_to_300.
